name: Fucked Up
description:
Fucked Up

An expirimental game about life, how what we need to succeed will always lead to our inevitable death. All that darkness packed into a "Spacewar! style" game about collecting glowing circles. Have fun!

Controls:

      • Control - Toggle between keyboard and mouse
      • WASD/Mouse - Moving around
      • Spacebar/Left Mouse Button - Speed up
      • Scroll up/down - Zoom in/out
      • F - Fullscreen
      • R - Restart after dying
      • Escape - Stop the game

Also, Controllers are supported!

For business inquiries, contact or questions please email me: TobyVeer@gmail.com
